name: Legend Bubbles
description:
Be the legendary fighter! Aim and shoot bubbles in Legend Bubbles puzzle game, beat the challenges and pop your way to a smashing victory!

Legend Bubbles is the ultimate bubble shooter game! A perfect bubbles game to play with family and friends and have a great time. No internet connection is needed so you can play everywhere, anywhere and as much as you want.

Team up with friends to explode all the colorful balloons and win the battle. Test your strategy skills as you hit and burst balls in this addicting bubble shooter game. Shoot and pop your way around tricky challenges, reach the level target, achieve high scores and win coins!

Join the Legendary Adventure Today!
* Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
* Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop and smash the group.
* Journey through thousands of action-packed levels and solve puzzles.
* Bubble swap is free, just tap on your bubble to change its color.
* Boost your experience with awesome power-ups.
* Win enough points to earn at least one star.
* Drop the big groups of bubbles first so you can clear a path.
* Complete the missions and clear the board.
* Win levels by popping all the balloons in limited shots.
* Play online or offline- no wifi connection is needed!
Strategy-Based Bubble Shooter Game
Drop the big groups of bubbles first so you can clear a path. See which bubble color you are getting next so you can work out a strategy to pop your way to victory and remove all the bubbles from the board. You can restart any level without having to wait for lives, as they are unlimited!


Get ready to experience the ultimate bubble popping fun. Download the best action game and fight to defend the bubble world!

Be sure that you’ll never get bored playing this amazing Legend Bubbles game, so warm up your fingers, clear your mind and let the adventure begin. With thousands of legendary levels and awesome features, you will enjoy hours of bubble crashing fun!

Can you pop all the balls and unlock the bubble legend?

Try out Legend Bubbles now and explore plenty of exciting levels, challenges, and puzzles that will keep you engaged for hours!
